0: When a male penguin falls in love with female penguin, he searches the entire beach to find the perfect pebble to present to her.
1: New Zealand will deny people residency visa’s if they too high of a BMI and there are cases where people have been rejected because of their weight.
2: Whenever a pregnant women suffers from organ damage like heart attack, the fetus sends stem cells to the organ helping it to repair.
3: It is illegal to climb trees in Oshawa, a town in Ontario, Canada.
4: Brown eyes are blue underneath, and you can actually get a surgery to turn brown eyes blue.
5: A bolt of lightning is six times hotter than the sun.
6: When a person cries and the first drop of tears come from the right eye, its happiness. if it from left eye, it’s pain.
Only 2% of Earth population naturally has green eyes.
7: Having bridesmaids in a wedding wasn’t originally for moral support. They were intended to confuse evil spirits or those who wished to harm the bride.
8: Crying makes you feel better, reduce stress, and may help to keep the body healthy.
9: Mount Everest is pronounced as Eve-rest, not Ever-est , as it is named after George Everest.
10: All pandas in the world are on loan from China.
11: When howling together, no two wolves will howl on the same note, instead, they harmonize to create the illusion that there are more of them than there actually are.
12: Your nose can remember 50,000 different scents.
13: India’s “Go Air” airline only hires female flight attendants because they are lighter, so they save up to US$500,000 per year in fuel.
14: At room temperature, the average air molecule travels at the speed of a rifle bullet.
15: The most common color for highlighters is yellow because it doesn’t leave a shadow on the page when photocopied.
16: The Bermuda Triangle has as many ship and plane disappearances as any other region of the ocean.
17: Dolphins recognize and admire themselves in mirrors.
18: After working out, it takes 5 hours for your body temperature to return to normal.
19: Children have more taste buds than adults.
20: The eye makes movements 50 times every second.
21: An ant’s sense of smell is stronger than a dog’s.
22: A day on Venus lasts longer than a year, it is 243 Earth days.
23: A snail breathes through its foot.
24: Polar bear fur is transparent, not white.
25: Cat kidneys are so efficient they can rehydrate by drinking seawater.
26: During a car crash, 40% of drivers never even hit the brakes.
27: When the moon is directly overhead, you weigh slightly less.
28: Sitting straight up is bad for your back. You should slough at an angle of 135 degrees.

32: 90% of U.S. media(TV, news, radio) is owned by 6 companies.

37: Having friends from other cultures makes you more creative, study found.
38: Cherries can cause cancer cells to kill themselves.

40: Shark pregnancies last up to 4 years.

42: Smiling actually boosts your immune system.
43: Dogs and elephants are the only animals that understand pointing.
44: The main exporter of Brazil nuts is not Brazil. It’s Bolivia.
45: At rest, your brain one fifth of a calorie per minute.
46: A single tree can absorb more than 10 pounds of CO2 each year.
47: Amazon River once flowed in the opposite direction, from east to west.
48: Bald eagles are so named because balde is an old English word meaning white.
49: The Amazon River discharges 5 times as much water as any other river on the planet.

52: A koi fish named Hanoko lived for 225 years.

56: Giraffe are already extinct in at least seven countries in Africa.

58: The Mona Lisa has no eyebrows.

61: Air pollution in China increases snowfall in California.

64: You can start a fire with ice.
65: The first color photograph was taken in 1861.

79: Antarctica is the only continent with no owls.

86: There are approximately 9,000 taste buds on your tongue.
